Krisztián Hofstädter

focus trial +

Stream of compositions made live with my Focus prototype, a SuperCollider sequencer generating random musical pattern.

time: Dec 2013

tags: music, music release, programming, SuperCollider

Stream of compositions made live with Focus prototype, a sequencer capable of generating random musical patterns: pitch, volume, duration of sound and duration between sounds. The sequencer was developed in SuperCollider 3.6 for my MA dissertation titled ‘The development of software for auditory display incorporating principles of generative music and neuro-feedback training’.

tools: SuperCollider, Logic
